name: Al Zahra Islamic Center
description: Al Zahra Islamic Center of Louisville, Kentucky is an Islamic center dedicating to serving the muslim community in Louisville and the surrounding area. We offer a variety of services including Jummah prayeyrs. We also host community events and activities throughout the year in service of the Quran and the Ahlul Bayt.
about:
Al Zahra Islamic Center of Louisville was first esablished in Established in 1996 to serve the growing community of followers of the Ahlul Bayt in Louisville, KY. More information on our regular programs can be found on our Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/Alzaharah/ 
4010 Bishop Lane, Louisville, KY 40218, United States.

addresses: 4010 Bishop Lane Louisville, KY 40218, United States

donation.title: Donations
donation.subtitle: Help build and maintain the society
donation.description:
Your contribution will help us to maintain and develop the wide range of services we offer. Prophet Muhammad ﷺ said: “Allah said: ‘Spend, O son of Adam, and I shall spend on you.’”.

**PLEASE NOTE: All donations are non-refundable. Please speak to a member of the team if you would like further clarification before making a donation.**
